bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with tan huan feng 癱瘓風 , paralysis wind. Zheng lei ben cao 證類本草 Substance Entry a jiao 阿 膠 quotes Kai yuan guang ji fang Recipe book. Tang era, 723. 開元廣濟方 : 療攤緩風及諸風，手脚不遂，腰脚無力者 , “It cures paralysis wind and all other types of wind; with the hands and legs not following [one’s command], and the lower back and the legs lacking strength”. This is quoted again in Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry a jiao 阿膠 where the term given is 攤緩偏風 , “ Partial paralysis wind ”.
